title: Did Biden Wear His Walking Boot on the Wrong Foot?
subtitle: Conspiracy theorists resorted to blatant digital manipulation to attack the U.S. president-elect in December 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Photographs prove that U.S. President-elect Biden put an orthopedic boot on the "wrong foot" in December 2020, accidentally "revealing" that his fractured foot was a ruse.
